item.title: RS 06 Download
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Alright, Moparisthebest has come to a decision about this. We’re not intervening in the politics of this server download but, given that we recognize it as legitimately copyrighted and unlicensed by the owner and it was illegitimately acquired, we are taking the stance of removing it from this community. This decision is final and won’t be overturned by anyone other than Moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.title: RS 06 Download
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It’s our policy to let the person who leaked the source and the owner settle any copyright issues. We aren’t going to interfere unless we have a court order which tells us to.

Now, this decision is explicitly for the source of rs2006. The topic toil posted went way beyond the lines of being acceptable. He posted doxed information on top of passwords, database information, website code, access to the git repo, and the source. He’s been banned and his topic has been removed. We don’t condone that sort of behavior here. The server source will remain available, however.

Read full topic

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:86, topic:449357”][quote author=…::Coded::… link=topic=552254.msg4046268#msg4046268 date=1342127548]

What. The. Fuck.

There’s so much legal talk on this damn thread that I can’t even tell who’s on either side.

OT: I really hate the 2006 remake bullshit, due to this crap there are about 50 of these in our server development section. I’m not going to even touch it but really nice release, I love when fags think they got shit and just get it taken away.

You couldn’t make a server as successful as rs 2006 if you tried

Never said I could did I? Did I at any point say that I could do better? Nope, I just said it sucks.
[/quote]

I was implying you’re butthurt because it’s successful, and you’ll never be, idiot. It “sucking” is your opinion.

David is actually wrong, I’m waiting for Taharok to step in here and clear things up.
He and I have been talking and have come to an agreement.

yeeeyeyeey[/quote]
I’m not butthurt about anything, you see, I don’t need a RSPS to be successful, which is where the line between me and you are.

And if it was so successful then why is it Hacked + released, guess success doesn’t include Security

item.title: RS 06 Download
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:72, topic:449357”]After reconsideration and talking it over with blake, this topic is again open. Blake did not have the right to withdraw the GPL license from rune source when vault adapted it, according to the can-developer-third-party clause of the GPL version 3 software license. Given that the GPL is designed in such a way that you cannot statically link to any GPL library without also inheriting the GPL license, RS-2006 must be under the GPL license because it uses rune-source. The GPL also states that it does not explicitly say that source code must be kept open to the public, but it does say that once the public has it, it cannot be withdrawn.

sinisoul has complete rights to have this topic open and is allowed to recreate his OP.[/quote]

Aha. ;p

Read full topic
